hibernate-mapping.query: from CFinancialYear f where f.id=? AND ((f.startingDate<=? AND f.endingDate>=?) OR (f.endingDate>=?))

select sum(br.additionAmount)-sum(br.deductionAmount) from BudgetReAppropriation br where br.state in (from org.egov.infstr.models.State where type='BudgetReAppropriation' and value=?) and br.budgetDetail in (:param_1)
